display_long_description:
# Discover the Ultimate Pickleball Experience and More!
- Unleash your creativity and fitness with our configurable custom physics engine. Whether you're aiming for precision, training for excellence, or just having fun, our platform has it all, with **9** sports and **27** environments to explore.
[media]
# Key Features:
- AI-Powered Pickleball: Experience outrageous rallies and exciting gameplay with our advanced AI Bots and **Multiplayer** for Singles and Doubles, with **instant replay**.
[media]
- Realistic Gameplay: Use your real-life forehand, backhand, dinks, and volleys to enhance your skills with **custom grip** adapters.
- Ambidextrous Play: Perfect for left, right-handed and ambidextrous players.
- **Single controller play** for double handed shots.
- **Ball machine with custom shot editor**: Take on several drills with a fully programmable ball machine. 
[media]
- **Practice Wall & Mirror mode**: Hone your skills with endless practice. Challenge yourself with different perspectives.
[media]
- **Over 50 leaderboards**: ranked daily, weekly, and all-time scores.
- Configurable Settings: Display fault trajectory, ball trail, etc.
# Multiplayer:
- Skill-based **matchmaking** worldwide.
- Invite friends
- Create and join courts for pickup games.

# Fitness Tracker:
- Keeps a 7-day history of balls hit and minutes played

# Eight unlockable sports:
- Padel
- Badminton
- Baseball
- Cricket
- Zombies First Person Shooter
- Racquetball
- Paddleball
- Handball
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Support:
- https://www.facebook.com/groups/vrpickleball/
- https://discord.gg/gHZCUSPuRE
- Email: viniotstudios@gmail.com

- Unleash your creativity and fitness with our configurable custom physics engine. Whether you're aiming for precision, training for excellence, or just having fun, our platform has it all, with **9** sports and **27** environments to explore.

# Key Features:
- AI-Powered Pickleball: Experience outrageous rallies and exciting gameplay with our advanced AI Bots and **Multiplayer** for Singles and Doubles, with **instant replay**.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982534_1714346892674365_7383033213071457458_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ICnPdHr8MugQ7kNvgEIInsC&_nc_oc=AdhF1i-on4DucKCowqUZ3SzbmLI06KJz-h4nnASq5tRpovEPHJ0BmVaEcbRx_J-_yBc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AHwjdjhVoUCrjfbB63Ou7cn&oh=00_AYGs9vE0yumtMyA5MsBTFylMs3fe7tSlxXwSzkMeAOv5jQ&oe=67D900E6)
- Realistic Gameplay: Use your real-life forehand, backhand, dinks, and volleys to enhance your skills with **custom grip** adapters.
- Ambidextrous Play: Perfect for left, right-handed and ambidextrous players.
- **Single controller play** for double handed shots.
- **Ball machine with custom shot editor**: Take on several drills with a fully programmable ball machine.

- **Practice Wall & Mirror mode**: Hone your skills with endless practice. Challenge yourself with different perspectives.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38984467_559682256767857_4668728143426452366_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PiEm08xPwoMQ7kNvgGRzR92&_nc_oc=Adi246c1B0jlTIv3k0GH3WT_J4QmHPugvQ5jnrXMl9_u2cEVcM5XC5vpUbP0qCFC-Is&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AHwjdjhVoUCrjfbB63Ou7cn&oh=00_AYG-rlREyhWew42RCAREmirVP09OqSb93MssIA91dDUYYQ&oe=67D8F0BE)
- **Over 50 leaderboards**: ranked daily, weekly, and all-time scores.
- Configurable Settings: Display fault trajectory, ball trail, etc.
# Multiplayer:
- Skill-based **matchmaking** worldwide.
- Invite friends
- Create and join courts for pickup games.

# Fitness Tracker:
- Keeps a 7-day history of balls hit and minutes played

# Eight unlockable sports:
- Padel
- Badminton
- Baseball
- Cricket
- Zombies First Person Shooter
- Racquetball
- Paddleball
- Handball
